function.name: Gdp Message Sent
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a GDP message is sent. It is expected to return TRUE if the sent message was processed by the GDP plugin, FALSE otherwise.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table used to transmit the message.

arg.name: profileId
arg.description: The profile ID included in the message.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: messageTag
arg.description: The tag of the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the message that was sent.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the message.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Message Sent
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a Remote Control 1.0 or 1.1 message is sent.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table used to transmit the message.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: messageTag
arg.description: The tag of the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the message that was sent.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the message.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value.

function.name: Zrc 2 0 Message Sent
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a ZRC 2.0 message is sent.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table used to transmit the message.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: messageTag
arg.description: The tag of the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the message that was sent.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the message.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value.

function.name: Message Sent
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a message is sent. It is called after any profile-specific callbacks.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table used to transmit the message.

arg.name: profileId
arg.description: The profile ID included in the message.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: messageTag
arg.description: The tag of the message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the message that was sent.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the message.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value.

function.name: Gdp Incoming Message
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when any message is received. This callback is expected to return TRUE if the passed message was processed by the GDP plugin, FALSE otherwise.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table corresponding to the PAN on which the message was received.

arg.name: profileId
arg.description: The profile ID included in the message.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: txOptions
arg.description: The TX options used by the source node to transmit the received message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the received message.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the received message.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Incoming Message
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a Remote Control 1.0 or 1.1 message is received.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table corresponding to the PAN on which the message was received.

arg.name: vendorId
arg.description: The vendor ID included in the message.

arg.name: txOptions
arg.description: The TX options used by the source node to transmit the received message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the received message.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the received message.

function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a ZRC 2.0 message is received.

arg.name: vendorId

arg.name: txOptions
arg.description: The TX options used by the source node to transmit the received message.

arg.name: message
arg.description: A pointer to the payload of the received message.

arg.name: messageLength
arg.description: The length in bytes of the received message.

function.name: Incoming Message
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a message is received. It is called after any profile-specific callbacks.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry in the pairing table corresponding to the PAN on which the message was received.

arg.name: profileId

function.name: Gdp Discovery Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a discovery request for the GDP profile is received.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the requesting device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the requesting device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type requested.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the request.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Discovery Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a discovery request for the Remote Control 1.0 or 1.1 profile is received.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the requesting device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the requesting device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type requested.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the request.

function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a discovery request for the ZRC 2.0 profile is received.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the requesting device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the requesting device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type requested.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the request.

function.name: Mso Discovery Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a discovery request for the MSO profile is received.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the requesting device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the requesting device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type requested.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the request.

function.name: Gdp Discovery Response
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a discovery response for the GDP profile is received.

arg.name: atCapacity
arg.description: TRUE if the node sending the discovery response has no free entry in its pairing table, FALSE otherwise.

arg.name: channel
arg.description: The channel on which the discovery response was received.

arg.name: panId
arg.description: The PAN identifier of the responding device.

arg.name: ieeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the responding device.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The capabilities of the responding device.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the responding device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the responding device.

arg.name: rxLinkQuality
arg.description: The LQI of the discovery response.

arg.name: discRequestLqi
arg.description: The LQI of the discovery request command frame reported by the responding device.

function.name: Gdp Discovery Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the discovery process for the GDP profile has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Discovery Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the discovery process for the Remote Control 1.0 or 1.1 profile has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

function.name: Zrc 2 0 Discovery Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the discovery process for the ZRC 2.0 profile has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

function.name: Mso Discovery Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the discovery process for the MSO profile has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

function.name: Gdp Auto Discovery Response Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the auto discovery response process for the GDP profile has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

arg.name: srcIeeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the node from which the discovery request command frame was received. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The node capabilities of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: A pointer to an ::EmberRf4ceVendorInfo struct containing the vendor information of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is non-NULL only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: A pointer to an ::EmberRf4ceApplicationInfo struct containing the application information of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is non-NULL only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type being discovered. If this is 0xFF, any type is being requested. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Auto Discovery Response Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the auto discovery response process for the Remote Control 1.0 or 1.1 profile has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

arg.name: srcIeeeAddr
arg.description: The IEEE address of the node from which the discovery request command frame was received. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The node capabilities of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: A pointer to an ::EmberRf4ceVendorInfo struct containing the vendor information of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is non-NULL only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: A pointer to an ::EmberRf4ceApplicationInfo struct containing the application information of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is non-NULL only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: searchDevType
arg.description: The device type being discovered. If this is 0xFF, any type is being requested. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities

arg.name: vendorInfo

function.name: Mso Auto Discovery Response Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the auto discovery response process for the MSO profile has completed.

arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the discovery succeeded or the failure reason.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The node capabilities of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is meaningful only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: A pointer to an ::EmberRf4ceVendorInfo struct containing the vendor information of the node that issued the discovery request. This parameter is non-NULL only if the status parameter is ::EMBER_SUCCESS.

function.name: Gdp Pair Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a pair request for the GDP profile is received.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the pairing is a new pairing, a duplicate or if the pairing table is full.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry that will be used by the stack for the pairing link.

arg.name: sourceIeeeAddr
arg.description: The source IEEE address of the incoming pair request.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The node capabilities of the node that issued the pair request.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: keyExchangeTransferCount
arg.description: The number of transfers to be used to exchange the link key with the pairing originator.

function.name: Remote Control 1 1 Pair Request
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when a pair request for the Remote Control 1.0 or 1.1 profile is received.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the pairing is a new pairing, a duplicate or if the pairing table is full.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the entry that will be used by the stack for the pairing link.

arg.name: sourceIeeeAddr
arg.description: The source IEEE address of the incoming pair request.

arg.name: nodeCapabilities
arg.description: The node capabilities of the node that issued the pair request.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the requesting device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the requesting device.

arg.name: keyExchangeTransferCount
arg.description: The number of transfers to be used to exchange the link key with the pairing originator.

arg.name: keyExchangeTransferCount

function.name: Gdp Pair Complete
function.description: This function is called by the RF4CE Profile plugin when the pairing process for the GDP profile has completed.

arg.name: status
arg.description: An ::EmberStatus value indicating whether the pairing succeeded or the failure reason.

arg.name: pairingIndex
arg.description: The index of the pairing table entry corresponding to the pairing link that was established during the pairing process.

arg.name: vendorInfo
arg.description: The vendor information of the peer device.

arg.name: appInfo
arg.description: The application information of the peer device.
